swadlr

swadlr provides access to the EPI State of Working America Data Library (SWADL) API.

Examples

Use swadlr if you need to programmatically retrieve a time series from SWADL:

get_swadl(
  indicator = "hourly_wage_percentiles",
  measure = "nominal_wage",
  dimension = list("wage_percentile" = "wage_p50")
)

For a summary of what is available for a given indicator

swadl_indicator("hourly_wage_percentiles")

If you have the need to retrieve multiple, don’t use the API and instead simply download all the data.

Installation

You can install swadlr from r-universe:

install.packages(
  "swadlr",
  repos = c("https://economic.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org")
)

Documentation

See the package website for full documentation and the Getting started vignette for more examples.
